item.description:
Den Rock is located off Rt 114 in N. Andover, across from the Market Basket mall. Easy access from RT 495 :) Bring your gear/and ropes if you have them, otherwise let me know if you need gear.
See you there
Kellie
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the large green van in the parking lot or we will be up at the cliff. follow the wide path, take a left at the fork and hike up to the obvious cliff.
item.why: This climbing area is small, great for an evening blast. Many boulder problems and small topropes/leads.
item.name: Evening Blast
